alert.note: Alert for Adams; Juneau (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 09 at 9:47AM CDT until further notice by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in La Crosse WI has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Wisconsin... Wisconsin River at Castle Rock Dam affecting Juneau and Adams Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... ...REPLACES RIVER FLOOD WATCH... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wisconsin River at Castle Rock Dam. * WHEN...From late tonight until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:10 AM CDT Sunday the flow was 28,784.0 cfs. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight and continue rising to 35,000.0 cfs early Thursday morning. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood flow is 30,000.0 cfs. - Flood History...No available flood history. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional river and weather information is available at www.weather.gov/lacrosse. The next statement will be issued this evening at 945 PM CDT.
